title: Pixel 4 XL screen goes black and unresponsive during phone calls since upgrade to Android 11
content:
Since Android 11, my face unlock no longer works and the screen goes black and unresponsive during phone calls. The only way I can get my screen to work is if the other party in the call hangs up. I can't use the dial pad or press the hang up button since the screen is all black. 

I have tried all the fixes mentioned so far. I do not have a screen protector and the proximity sensor is working. I installed an app to test it. I have cleared the phone cache and uninstalled and reinstalled the phone app. The best fix that works so far is booting the device in safe mode then restarting it. After a safe mode boot, the screen works fine during calls and the face unlock works, but only for a few hours. I have been booting my phone into safe mode and rebooting numerous times a day, because I use my phone for work. I tried factory restoring and that didn't work either.
